Qian Zhang, Dong Wang, Run Zhao, Yinggang Yu, “SoundLip: Enabling Word and Sentencelevel Lip Interaction for Smart Devices”, IMWUT/Ubicomp 2021 (CCF-A). 2. Qian Zhang, Dong Wang, Run Zhao, Yinggang Yu, Junjie Shen, “Sensing to Hear: Speech Enhancement for Mobile Devices Using Acoustic Signals”, IMWUT/Ubicomp 2021 (CCF-A). 3. Qian Zhang, Dong Wang, Run Zhao, Yinggang Yu, Jiazhen Jing, “Write, Atend and Spell:Streaming End-to-end Free-style Handwriting Recognition Using Smartwatches”, IMWUT/Ubicomp2021 (CCF-A). 4. Qian Zhang, Jiazhen Jing, Run Zhao, Dong Wang, “WearSign: Pushing the Limit of Sign Language Translation Using Wearables”, IMWUT/Ubicomp 2022 (CCF-A). 5. Yinggang Yu, Dong Wang, Run Zhao, Qian Zhang, “RFID Based Real-time Recognition of ongoing Gesture with Adversarial Learning”, Sensys 2019 (CCF-B) 科研项目 国家自然科学基金青年项目（No. 62102245），“基于超声波唇动感知的语音增强方法研究”， 2022.1-2024.12获奖情况 学术兼职 Reviewer：IMWUT/Ubicomp 2022、2023， SIGGRAPH Asia2023 地址：上海闵行区东川路800号 软件大楼 电话：021-34204692 传真：021-34205145 邮编：200240 版权所有@上海交通大学软件学院 loading......
